kube_containers_description: Soon, you will be able to see all of the containers and services running in your Kubernetes cluster here.
kube_containers_description_dashboard: Please use the "kubectl" command line tool, or install the Kubernetes Dashboard.  The Kubernetes Dashboard is a web user interface maintained by the Kubernetes community, and is exposed as a service within your cluster.
kube_containers_description_dashboard_li: Follow this guide to install the Kubernetes Dashboard.
